version_description:
Now you can track how much money you have saved by breaking your habit.

Also:
- General bug fixes
- Easier to enter what you quit
- Revamped interface

If you like my app, please take the time to give it a nice review. It really helps. -chris

Now with Apple Watch support!

Also:
- you can now see how much you have saved on the main screen
- it's easier to reset your quit to today
- added decimals to days
- added separator comma's to $$$ on the quit view screen

Reviews reset with each app update. If you like my app, please take the time to give it a nice review. It really helps. - Chris

Currency support added! Quit That now supports the Euro and Pound.

Bug fixed where the app would crash in iOS 9.3 if you deleted a quit.

I've heard all of your requests. I have some great features planned for the next release! -chris

Currency support added! Quit That now supports the Euro and Pound.

I've heard all of your requests. I have some great features planned for the next release! -chris
